vocab.english: (particle marking the following noun as a direct object)
without results; in vain; waste efforts
behind; at the back; in the rear
not a few; many; a lot
not only that; more than that
work on a job; work part-time
To give or have an injection
start business; open a private practice
arrange; put in order; exclude; rehearse
plate; dish; tray; market price; game; set
around; about; from beginning to end
rob; grab; vie for; scramble for
go; leave; depart; send; be away from
correct; so; like that; as if
give way; let; allow; make; ask
up and down; about; relative; top and bottom
be born; give birth; life; living; student
platform; stage; desk; stand; table; set
suit well; mix; adjust; fit in perfectly
stop; cease; suspend; call off; halt
promote; push forward; give impetus to
advance; carry forward; push on; give impetus to
go down; descend; go on; continue
press; push; keep under control; bear down
smoke; tobacco; be irritated by smoke
now; at the moment; before one’s eyes
have plenty of; there’s no lack of
a person engaged in some field of activity (waiter; server)
long ago; for a long time
catch; catch hold of; grip; capture

grammar.english: The 'Ba' construction (Moving or disposing of something)
grammar.example: 请把书放在桌子上。

grammar.english: Passive voice (The subject is acted upon)
grammar.example: 我的蛋糕被弟弟吃了。
除了苹果以外，我还买了香蕉。
除了小明以外，大家都来了。
她不但漂亮，而且很聪明。
如果明天下雨，我们就不去爬山。
只有努力学习，才能考好。
天气越来越热了。
我们还是坐出租车吧。

grammar.english: Starting an action or expressing a perspective
grammar.example: 天阴了，快要下起雨来了。
老师走进了教室来。

grammar.english: Simultaneous actions (Doing two things at once)
grammar.example: 我一边吃饭，一边看电视。
我先洗澡，然后睡觉。

grammar.english: Adverbial marker (How an action is performed)
grammar.example: 他开心地笑了起来。
我明天或是后天去你家。

grammar.english: Expressing the result of an action (清楚, 懂, 到)
grammar.example: 我听懂了老师说的话。
关于这个问题，我还不清楚。
我对中国历史很感兴趣。
雨越下越大。

grammar.pattern: 快要 ... 了 / 就要 ... 了
grammar.example: 火车快要开了。

topics.label: Travel & Exploration
topics.description: Discussing travel plans, buying tickets, luggage, and experiences in different cities.

topics.label: Workplace & Career
topics.description: Office interactions, meetings, using emails (邮件), and job responsibilities.

topics.label: Feelings & Emotions
topics.description: Expressing anxiety (着急), satisfaction (满意), happiness, and worry.

topics.label: Entertainment & Media
topics.description: Discussing movies, TV shows (节目), news, and sports matches.

topics.label: Environment & Lifestyle
topics.description: Comparing city life vs. countryside, environmental protection, and neighborhood surroundings.

topics.label: Solving Daily Problems
topics.description: Asking for repairs (修), finding lost items, and explaining accidents (意外).

topics.label: Culture & Traditions
topics.description: Simple discussions on holidays, traditional food, and cultural differences.

topics.label: Education & Self-Improvement
topics.description: University majors (专业), library research, and learning strategies (预习/复习).
